diff --git a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1174.json b/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1174.json

@@ -12,12 +12,19 @@
   "created_at": "2018-11-02T14:28:17Z",
   "github_updated_at": "2021-06-28T10:55:11Z",
   "body_snippet": "After maximize from start panel, screen is bad. Work correctly after reload connection only. (print screen without icons in attachment)\r\n\r\n![vb](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32328261/47920906-92e82600-deb3-11e8-8794-074209775187.jpg)\r\n\r\nWindows 7 64bit SP1",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P2-bug",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-17",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "The RDP ActiveX control is unconditionally set to `Anchor = AnchorStyles.None` in `InitializeActiveXControl`, preventing it from resizing when the main window is maximized, even if `SmartSize` or `FitToWindow` is selected."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [
     {
       "id": "MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDUzODE2NjYzNw==",
@@ -34,5 +41,5 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": true,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): The RDP ActiveX control is unconditionally set to `Anchor = AnchorStyles.None` in `InitializeActiveXControl`, preventing it from resizing when the main window is maximized, even if `SmartSize` or `FitToWindow` is selected.\nApproach: Modify `SetResolution` in `RdpProtocol.cs` to set `Control.Dock = DockStyle.Fill` when `SmartSize` or `FitToWindow` is enabled, or ensures correct anchoring for resizing."
 }
